reviews.customers_say: Customers find these pajamas comfortable, with excellent fit and a stunning rose red color that can be dressed up or down.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortability at it's best
items.body: Omg! I absolutely love this lounge set!!! They are heavy without being hot! They are extremely high quality materials and o so comfortable. I bought 2 and requested another for Christmas üéÑ ‚ò∫Ô∏è Read more
items.author: Cheryl Owens

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars shrinks easily even when air-dried so size up!
items.body: I loved these I bought in 3 different colors upon first purchase. They all fit perfectly, loose and giving an effortless relaxed look. But even though I washed according to instructions and air-dried, they all shrunk. They are still wearable and I can still wear them around the house but they are now smaller and fit too awkwardly to look stylish and put together while running errands. Some colors shrunk more than others. The tan not as much but the green and blue shrunk more. The material is so thick and feels expensive and the quality is great aside from the unfortunate shrinking. I may eventually purchase a larger size and see how that goes. Read more
items.author: Mary

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size and very soft
items.body: Very comfortable, very soft, true to size, and not too thick or heavy for indoor wear. Read more
items.author: Mary W

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Set, But Definite Size Issues
items.body: Both of the sets pictured are size S, purchased about 3 weeks apart. I liked the black ones so much that I had to get another color. I ordered the khaki set and the black ones are pretty significantly smaller. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô2 and about 100 lbs and they both fit well enough but I probably wouldn‚Äôt wear them anywhere but home. Maybe the black set if I just had a super quick errand. To me, the black top fits like a regular sweater and the khaki top is more of a cozy pj top. The black pants are comfy but fitted and ankle length, and the khaki are even comfier, relaxed and full length. They‚Äôre too hot to sleep in on anything but the coldest night, but they‚Äôre perfect for around the house. Two sets are plenty for me, so I don‚Äôt plan on buying any other colors, but I did gift a set to my mom and will probably gift to other friends. Also, the black one picks up every piece of lint and hair ever, so not ideal for people with anything but black pets. Read more
items.author: Sam

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this brand
items.body: Love this brand. I have ordered numerous pajama sets, tops, and now this 2pc set in three different colors. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô1‚Äù, 108lbs and ordered the S. Fits perfectly. I‚Äôve tried other sweater sets on Amazon, but ended up sending those back and ordering multiple in this brand! Read more
items.author: Jackie Zapata

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Seller's size chart is WRONG Amazon's size chart accurate
items.body: I'm 5'1 190lbs purchased Xl which says on the companie's chart size, that the bust size is 46 inches, totally incorrect. The pants were good in length & fit however if I sized up on top the bottoms would be too big. Quality is good & really cute just size chart is wrong which makes it a frustrating shopping experience Read more
items.author: C

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this outfit!
items.body: I am 5'8 and 127lbs and I ordered a medium based on the reviews. I love the feel of this outfit and the rose red color is stunning. It's a sweater/sweatshirt blend and is warm without being too hot and it is adorable on. I have bought many two piece outfits from Amazon and this one is probably my favorite. I could have gotten a small, but was worried about the pant length after reading the reviews, however, the medium is fine except being somewhat loose on the backside. I will be ordering the green next and will probably get a small for a more fitted look. If you are on the fence, buy it! I just ordered one for my daughter. It's an amazing outfit for the price. Read more
items.author: Brian minnich

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Floral Pink, Black, Red, Rose Red, Navy, Khaki, Floral Light Green, Floral White, Beige, Christmas Red, Caramel, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
